txt.en:
'My, you do love the Harvest! I hope you are having a fun time at the Harvest Festival!

'For your efforts, you should have a reward, and so here you are!'

'Come back tomorrow and I shall have more Harvest rewards for you!'
Rosa Hornblower is attending the Harvest Festival and encourages any visitor to partake in helping the Shire with the best harvest yet!

'Welcome, my friend!

'If you're here for the Harvest, I'd recommend you get in the spirit of the season and participate in many of our Harvest activities. If you're not here for the Harvest Festival, maybe you should be!

'For those folks that participate in many of our activities, there might just be a Harvest treat in store, so get out there!

'The night can get a bit chilly, but I'm sure you'll find company and good stories around the camp-fire!'
Every day there is something to do during the Harvest Festival.  Come and join everyone at the Party Tree, Wistmead, and housing neighbourhoods and participate in many Harvest Festival activities!
Rosa can be found by the Party Tree and in Wistmead.\n\nRosa Hornblower would like to thank you for your participation in the Harvest Festival today.

'Welcome, my friend!

'If you're here for the Harvest, I'd recommend you get in the spirit of the season and participate in many of our Harvest activities. If you're not here for the Harvest Festival, maybe you should be!

'For those folks that participate in many of our activities, there might just be a Harvest treat in store, so get out there!

'The night can get a bit chilly, but I'm sure you'll find company and good stories around the campfire!'

'My, you do love the Harvest! I hope you are having a fun time at the Harvest Festival!

'For your efforts, you should have a reward, and so here you are!'

'Come back tomorrow and I shall have more Harvest rewards for you!'
